response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which holds immense value and potential for growth. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe it could significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering the exceptional quality and long-term benefits this product offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. We are offering the product for $1,800,000. This price reflects not only the current market value but also anticipates the future potential and returns you can expect from investing in this product. I trust this opportunity aligns with your strategic goals and financial objectives. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to discussing how we can collaborate to achieve mutual success.", "product_price": 1800000}
